feed.title: Wiki-Go Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.12
entry.content:
• Adds missing styles for blockquotes in version history preview (9a01a8c by Amin Persia)
  • Splits settings dialog from two tabs to three tabs to make sure it fits on mobile devices. (9b8c331 by Amin Persia)
  • adds language support for Czech, Danish, Finnish, Hebrew, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Swedish, and Turkish (583c964 by Amin Persia)
  • Updates README with new preview.png and removes extra screenshots (b84bd01 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes print adding extra blank page (0c473ef by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.13
entry.content:
• Adds vendor dependencies to codebase for offline building (acbe190 by Amin Persia)
  • Updates go to 1.24.2 and its dependencies (c6a9771 by Amin Persia)
  • Refactors all popups to use the same positioning logic: positionPicker (1ca7f43 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds document linking to the editor (f25a944 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.14
entry.content:
• Changes comments timestamp from Unix to human readable (7318111 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds bidirectional text support to document picker search input (96646fa by Amin Persia)
  • Adds translations for document picker. Translations done by ChatGPT. (a248aff by Amin Persia)
  • Improves CSS for recent edits stats (6554729 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.15
entry.content:
• Adds Folder Structure to README (41ffcdf by Amin Persia)
  • Adds disable_file_upload_checking support used for local deployment (14de6da by Amin Persia)
  • Adds updating of anchor links list when the popup is opened (4f3698d by Amin Persia)
  • Adds translations for anchor picker. Translation done by ChatGPT. (cc14772 by Amin Persia)
  • Improves js heading anchor id generation (216cc17 by Amin Persia)
  • Removes homepage from documents list (591ab4c by Amin Persia)
  • Adds headinganchor preprocessor (a44649f by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.16
entry.content:
• Some css cleanup (bededbf by Amin Persia)
  • Adds cache-control for static files (af1a572 by Amin Persia)
  • Changes anchor button to first list docs then anchors of the selected doc (514f24e by Amin Persia)
  • Adds hover styles to heading anchors - hidden by default, visible on hover (bb15711 by Amin Persia)
